title: How to Say a Tongue Twister

steps.headline: Find the tongue twister you want to say successfully.
steps.description: Here let's use "Good blood, bad blood."

steps.headline: Write it down on a piece of paper, read it five times to yourself.
While looking at it say it at a normal speed, but whispering.
Now read it out loud very slowly, five times,
Do this again without looking at the paper.
Now say each word separately five times.
steps.description: Good five times, blood five times, etc.

steps.headline: Say each section (if any) of the tongue twister five times.
steps.description: "Good blood" and "Bad blood" are two separate sections in this tongue twister.

steps.headline: Say the tongue twister five times, but putting pauses in between each word:
Close your eyes, focus, and say it once.
steps.description: Did you say it right? If not, repeat all steps. If so, say it twice more and see if you can still say it.

steps.headline: Test yourself, say it five times fast.

text: Find the tongue twister you want to say successfully. Here let's use "Good blood, bad blood." Write it down on a piece of paper, read it five times to yourself.  While looking at it say it at a normal speed, but whispering. Do this five times. Now read it out loud very slowly, five times, "Go-od Bl-o-o-d, ba-d bl-o-o-d". Do this again without looking at the paper.  Now say each word separately five times. Good five times, blood five times, etc. Say each section (if any) of the tongue twister five times. "Good blood" and "Bad blood" are two separate sections in this tongue twister. Say the tongue twister five times, but putting pauses in between each word: "Good. Blood. Bad. Blood." Close your eyes, focus, and say it once. Did you say it right? If not, repeat all steps. If so, say it twice more and see if you can still say it. Test yourself, say it five times fast.
sentences: Find the tongue twister you want to say successfully.
Here let's use "Good blood, bad blood."
Write it down on a piece of paper, read it five times to yourself.
While looking at it say it at a normal speed, but whispering.
Do this five times.
Now read it out loud very slowly, five times, "Go-od Bl-o-o-d, ba-d bl-o-o-d".
Do this again without looking at the paper.
Now say each word separately five times.
Good five times, blood five times, etc.
Say each section (if any) of the tongue twister five times.
"Good blood" and "Bad blood" are two separate sections in this tongue twister.
Say the tongue twister five times, but putting pauses in between each word: "Good.
Blood.
Bad.
Blood."
Close your eyes, focus, and say it once.
Did you say it right?
If not, repeat all steps.
If so, say it twice more and see if you can still say it.
Test yourself, say it five times fast.
